name: Nalum - NSUT Alumni Web Portal

shortcuts.name: Nalum
shortcuts.description: Welcome to Nalum, the exclusive platform connecting NSUT students and alumni. Discover networking opportunities, mentorship, job offers, internships, and more while staying engaged with the NSUT community.
